document_data.name: Silvertree
document_data.mainbody: '''Silvertrees''' were a species of [[tree]]s that grew in the courtyard of the villa of [[House Maerdrym]] in the ancient city of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.History: Centuries after the fall of Myth Drannor in the [[Weeping War]], [[baelnorn]] protector of the ''[[mythal]]'' [[Miroden Silverblade]] reminisced about the beauty of the old city, swaying silvertrees and the [[Windsong Tower]] touching the night stars. In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, a [[Wearer of Purple]] of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] â€“ [[Kya Mordrayn]] used that memory to give the lich false promise of Myth Drannor's rebirth in exchange for his aid tapping into the ''mythal's'' magics.
